name: Alone (itch) (Jerau)
description:
Alone

You're alone in a post-apocalyptique world, without any other life than you. But you heard a strange song, what could have made this song ?

I made this game with Arthur Bouilloux, Quentin Fricou and Arnaud Quincy for a student work.

We had some instructions : 

- Limited 3D Software (Only add-on from unity)

- Black & White with only 1 color (we decided to not use a color and use a grey panel instead)

There are some bugs, but i hope you'll enjoy the experience ! 

Use a headphone for a better experience.

Alone need a controler to be play.

-> Download the .rar, extract the files,  execute the .exe from the PC file on your computer.

More of my games here: https://smevisulien.wixsite.com/mygames
